name: Thug Man
description:
(Joke Game) You have just been sentenced to death by King Strictly.  You must escape prison, form a gang, and kill King Strictly before you get executed.

Credit for scripts, songs and tilesets go to their respective creators.

M for Mature because of language, domestic violence, crime, drugs, sexual themes, and blood.

Trigger Warning for domestic violence and suicide.  Do NOT play if you are sensitive to content such as that.  Thank you.

Also, if you are under 17, do NOT play this game.  It's M for Mature for a reason.


NOTE: This is my first game I made using the RPG Maker MV engine (I have experience with other engines prior to this one though).  I was just getting used to MV when making this joke of a game.
